title: Locale issues (from #15206)
body:
As discussed in #15206, it seems that setting `LC_ALL` inside Spack build recpie doesn't seem to have any effect.

### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
spack --version
0.14.0-90-c0032a3
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ LC_ALL=POSIX spack install icu4c
```
